Summary Note:
Sofia Erika Martini and the RM are childhood friends, having attended the same schools and shared many life experiences. Their enduring friendship has laid a solid foundation for their business relationship.
Sofia Erika Martini is a seasoned professional with over 32 years of experience.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
Family Background: Sofia Erika Martini is currently divorced. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
Sofia completed her secondary education at Liceo Scientifico Enrico Fermi Bologna in 1987.
Sofia attended Luiss Guido Carli and graduated in 1993.
Additionally, she went on to study at Bocconi University until 1997.
Occupation History:
Sofia Erika Martini is a 55 year old Private Equity Investor from Italy.
Sofia Erika Martini began her professional journey as a Stockbroker at Intesa Sanpaolo S.p.A. in 1993, laying the foundation for future success.
Her subsequent role was as a Portfolio Manager at Intesa Sanpaolo S.p.A., where she continued to grow professionally from 1996 to 1998.
At UniCredit S.p.A., she worked as a Hedge Fund Manager from 1999 to 2004, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
In 2005, she transitioned to Intesa Sanpaolo S.p.A. to take on the position of Private Equity Investor, capitalizing on her expertise to propel business growth.
Wealth Summary:
During her work, she focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 1100000 EUR.
She has townhouse located in Parma, worth 1210000 EUR.

In addition to her primary residence, she owns house in Turin worth 1150000 EUR.

She inherited 1930000 EUR from her grandfather, a well-known Stock Trader, in 2010, allowing her to expand her investment portfolio.
Client Summary: Given the client's impressive career history and financial discipline, we are confident in her ability to achieve financial success and security.
